episodes.title: Way of the Ninja
episodes.description: A mysterious wanderer named Sensei Wu meets Kai and Nya before a skeleton army attacks, kidnaps Nya, and steals a hidden map. Wu trains Kai as a ninja in spinjitzu, where he joins other uniquely chosen warriors to rescue her.

episodes.title: King of Shadows
episodes.description: The ninja successfully recover three of the four Golden Weapons, leaving only the Sword of Fire, but dangerous confrontations have to be made to keep the weapons out of Garmadon's reach.
